reviews.review_text: Came when it was empty, glad because I get to sit and just enjoy the atmosphere. Staff is absolutely lovely & friendly, my sandwich (lemon rosemary chicken) was delicious and made super quickly. You can tell they love what they make and passionate about clean, healthy food. Their bread is also made in-house!!

BREAD PERFECTION !! Im not normally a sandwich person but I have to say this was by far the best sandwich Ive ever had in my life.  I had the crispy chicken special (recipe changes weekly) and this time it had truffle in it.  All the components that were in the sandwich from the house made bread to the sauce to the breaded chicken to the fresh greens inside were super fresh, and super tasty and flavourful. So many times a breaded chicken can easily be too dry or too salty but this was pure perfection. I also had a cruffin that had a delightfully light and fresh filling and an oat milk latte and both were also items I would come back for individually as well.  To absolutely nail it on all 3 items is a major feat, and truly a testament to this hole in the wall. Chefs kiss! Will absolutely be back.
This is one of the best places for a sandwich in Vancouver. They make their own bread, loaded with the best quality. Never disappoint.

Had a fantastic artisan breakfast at  #e food  this morning.  I had the Breakfast sandwich served on a delicious fresh bun, perfect egg, flavourful tomato and avocado.  Also had the potatoes and a pastry.  I think next time I ll ask for a little creme fraiche or sour cream for the potatoes but even without they were great. Clearly the staff cares deeply about the quality of their food and even seemed to enjoy being at work.

The most impressive part for me was the fresh baked sandwich breads! Oh my goodness, I love it ! I got spicy lemon rosemary chicken sandwich , everything was super fresh and tasty, especially vegetables. For sure gonna be back here. Friendly staff and nice sitting area inside and outside of the store .

This has been my favourite sandwich shop in downtown for years! I am warmly greeted by Glenn, Rob, and Rodrigo, who make the food with passion and care. They carry the most tasty and fresh gluten free bread that I have ever had. I highly recommend #e for their delicious, fresh and carefully curated menu!
Freshly made food and customer friendly service. There were single portion cookies and chocolate cakes looked tempting. Should try out next time. Food

The main differentiation for #e is that their sandwich contents are served hot. Unlike the pre-made sandwiches from coffee shops that are grilled on the outside, these are made to order   just like the ones I would make at home. The fresh ingredients and hot proteins make the sandwiches very enjoyable and comfort-food-like. We ordered two vegetarians. The roasted vegetables taste freshly roasted and not re-heated   I hope they are. I selected gluten free bread which tastes like real bread, only I didnt appreciate that the loaf was so narrow. A big disappointment for me was the olive tapenade. While the olive livened the taste, the garlic in the tapenade made me uncomfortable for a number of hours afterwards. But we will definitely be back to try other fillings and salads.

Heard lots of good feedback about this place and I work nearby so I figured Id go check it out. Tried the Reuben because I was craving beef, even though Ive had Reubens elsewhere in the past and didnt like them too much - mostly, the previous Reubens I tried had too little meat and way too much oily sauce. This one was perfect! Lots of meat, good quality bread, and just the right amount of dressing. Ill definitely be coming back to this place regularly from now on.

Fantastic Food! Glenn, the owner, makes his own bread, super fresh and delicious ... I found it on google map for great reviews and it is truly one to try. Store might not seem appealing from outside, but quite clean inside! We tried the Ruben with Dijon mustard and Chicken with Brie and jalapeno ... the bread is light, fluffy and yummy.

Such a gem! Very relaxed atmosphere, and friendly and knowledgeable staff, that genuinely love what they do. I got myself a meat lover pizza which was phenomenal, absolutely generous with the toppings, and they cure bacon themselves which is very cool. Also coming from a guy who doesnt eat crust, the crust was like its own meal, I havent had an experience this good in a while. The place is small and very cozy, idk how it is when it gets busy but when I was there it was very spacious. Latte is also good not bitter and milk isnt too frothy or burned. Music is nice balance between rap (MF doom), lo-fi, and electronic (daft punk-esque). Will definitely be coming back!
I have tried many sandwich places in Vancouver but this one is the exquisite!! Will definitely come back.

The sandwich was FANTASTIC!!! (That s coming from a sandwich lover, aka the husband.) We didn t actually expect it to live up to its hype as per their reviews, but it definitely did. The shop may be small, but the flavour is LARGE!!! We got the Black Angus Reuben, and the bread was so good. Some of the best bread we ve had! So reasonable for all its flavour!

This is a hidden gem! We stumbled onto this place for breakfast a couple weeks ago while in town for a conference from Seattle. Ordered London Fog (didnt know that the drink was said to be invented in Vancouver!), something from the menu, and some random cakes from the counter. Surprisingly everything was tasty! We ended up coming back again the day on our departure to pack some more pastries to go. Some reviews mentioned the service. Id say you would not feel the most welcoming atmosphere here, maybe because staff were busy in the morning hours,  but everyone was very friendly to us, despite that our little ones were hungry and loud.. They did not rush us, gave us good suggestions, extra cups, etc. I would come back again next time in town.
This is the best place in town for sandwiches. I adore their daily soup and sandwiches. The bread they use is crafted artistically, it s soft and crispy at the same time. Highly recommend this place!
Breakfast sandwiches are made fresh as opposed to heated up pre made like at many places. They make a great Americano too. A few outdoor tables.
The best reuben sandwich I ve ever had!!! Im not a big fan of sandwich but I am always up for sandwiches from E food. So fresh and tasty. Even pickle tastes awesome!

Cozy little place, the staff is very friendly and great food with amazing flavor. Sandwiches are crispy, warm, and satisfying. Exactly what I was looking for in the sandwiches. Vegan option available, in fact that is what I ordered.

Fresh local organic food hidden away in a small cafe on Burrard st. This place has the best chicken sandwiches around! They have daily specials which are very delicious and definatley worth checking out. Their daily made bread is the best around. They have freshly made beverages as well as take home meals ready to go in their fridge as well. Its too bad the location is so small because it can get quite crowded in there. In hindsight this is such a hidden gem in the city, I recomend to everyone!
Easily one the best sandwiches. Ingredients are freshly made and easily some of the best hand made bread I ve had. The lads inside are really friendly as well!

Best local stop for sandwiches! Owner was very nice, told us all their bread is baked fresh everyday. There s clearly a lot of love and care that goes into these sandwiches. Even make their own ice tea! Glad I discovered this gem today.
Absolutely stunning food! One of the best sandwiches I ve ever had. This is a must try!
We had great brunch sandwiches here! The quality of the food and service was fantastic. I definitely recommend this place!

The. Best. Crostata. Ever. We were lured into this somewhat discreet sandwich shop by the amazing smells coming from within. We were not disappointed. Really caught us off guard how good their items and customer service was. We were informed that everything is made in-house from scratch and it really shines through the goods on offer. 10/10. Will be back tomorrow.

If you want a sandwich that isn t just any other sandwich, this is the place to go! House made ingredients that are full of flavour, and super friendly staff. I m going to be bringing my friends here!
One of the best breakfast biscuit sandwiches I ve every had. We re coming back for one of their lunch sandwiches ASAP.
crispy chicken weekend special sandwich was delicious. The bread is amazing and the staff is so friendly. One of the best sandwiches I had in Vancouver.

I never write reviews but felt obligated to spread the good word. I thought to myself, man, Vancouver is lacking in the sandwich department. I dont understand all the hype around Meat&Bread, and Ive had Hubbub too many times. Did a little digging and discovered I live close-by this unassuming yet absolutely incredible sandwich spot! We ordered three sandwiches, and our favourite was the beef dip. The cracked salt on the fresh bread is so damn good. You know when you can taste the love someone put into their cooking? Its like that.

The little trek from Granville Island was worth the squeeze! This was the  special of the day  - Crispy buttermilk Jerk chicken on a fresh Tuscan bun topped with black bean mango salsa.  The flavours were well balanced and flavourful. It hada nice lingering heat that didn t destroy the tastebuds. Glenn was the owner and is a chef. Chef owner operated is always the best! Would definitely recommend!

small but clean space  food here was hella good  have to try the reuben sandwich  bread was so soft after toast it with the juicy beef  you wont able to stop . only three guys work here  but everyone have they own zone  must give you fast and nice service when you walk in .
This is the best breakfast since I came to Vancouver with reasonable price. I ordered  Nectarine Crostata  and the it tastes over my expectation!

I usually don t write reviews but I wanted a quick lunch that would fill me up and I wanted to try something new. I got the Black Angus Reuben and it was soo dank   ( I m full   ) They make their own bread and it has a few yummy salt morsels throughout, I particularly enjoyed that because I m a literal salt fiend lol. The two gentlemen that I interacted with were friendly, funny, and fast. The ginger ale actually taste like ginger too! Just go already

Amazing place, 10/10 would recommend !! The food is amazing, as much the sandwiches as the salads and the pastries, and even the bread is homemade. Amazing plus: the owner is amazingly nice. Dont hesitate !

This has been my favourite sandwich shop in downtown for years! I am warmly greeted by Glenn, Rob, and Rodrigo, who make the food with passion and care. They carry the most tasty and fresh gluten free bread that I have ever had. I highly recommend #e for their delicious, fresh and carefully curated menu!
I love this sandwich place, best in Vancouver! Love the chefs too

Our favourite place to eat! Fresh ingredients and extremely yummy creations....my boyfriend comes here daily for their sandwiches. Our favourites are their chicken, BLT, and reuben sandwiches...also their breakfast hash is awesome! And for take home meals, I recommend the spaghetti and meatballs, and pad Thai!  They can also make a small order or potatoes to go on the side if you re feeling extra hungry! Oh, and I love their fresh watermelon juice. Head chef is Glenn, and he ll be sure you have an incredible experience!

It was a great dine-in experience! Their sandwich was freshly served. You can also notice that the ingredients inside the sandwich were also fresh! We super love the taste and enjoyed our time there eating a superb meal. The staff were also very kind and I appreciate them a lot. I love their chicken sandwich, worth it until the last bite. Vegetarian options: They offer vegan sandwiches. Kid-friendliness: Kids would love the sandwiches here. Wheelchair accessibility: Wheelchairs could fit in the entrace and they could fit in the seating too.

Fantastic food not fast food! This is by far the best place to eat at! I have gone to this restaurant every single day this week because I was hooked after the first bite! The food takes a few minutes to get to you as it should because it is always fresh! They have new specials every day and every day I was extremely impressed! I will travel to eat at this restaurant. If youre looking for a place to eat look no further, this is the place to go! Thank you to the friendly staff who have treated my co-workers and I with great food and have welcomed us every day!
Hidden gem for sure. All home made and damn good. Price is right. Coffee is great. Staff is friendly.
One of the best spots to grab a biscuit or sandwich in the city Keep an eye out for the specials Food : 5/5

I love this place so much best fresh ingredients no frozen stuff just fresh and on top off all that chef glen is amazing too dont miss sathurday chicken fried sandwich they are the bomb thanks too sous cheff ROB aka BOB

INCREDIBLE sandwiches and cant wait to try the baked goods. The grilled cheese of the day (which had fried chicken and caramelized onions with cheddar) was by far the best grilled cheese Ive EVER had. So creative and tasty. Cant wait to return.
Best sandwich in Vancouver with a fresh menu that changes every day.

So happy I stumbled across this place. I got it for lunch one day and liked it so much I came back the next. The bread was excellent, the sandwiches were the perfect combo of stuff, and the staff was really nice. Highly recommend :)
Hands down one of the best sandwiches I ve ever had! The Panang peanut lamb was incredible. Freshly made buns are excellent. Support this business, you won t regret it!
Amazing sandwich, very friendly staff, love them and support them!

Delicious nutella berry pastry and hot beef sandwich! The staff was friendly in making recommendations, also walking out with our sandwiches while we waited outside. Gravy was homemade, and the grainy mustard in the sandwich made it one to remember. Will definitely be back soon!

Wow wow wow! I went for the Friday beef dip special and it was delightful! Warm, fresh, tasty, and comforting. The staff as well were so welcoming and made sure everything was to the highest standard. Cannot recommend this place enough!
Tiny little place, nice owner and killer sandwiches. I tried the meat loaf sandwich and it was very tasty

A great spot, bar none. Fresh sandwiches with fantastic ingredients. There is a limited selection on deck, but what they do have is a special combination of flavours that make for some sumptuous meals. Top them off with some superior soda selections; they re here too. I ve had the BLT and meatloaf sandwiches here. Both were great.  They had flavours unlike each other and I m sure the rest of the selection is the same.  The bread is distinct and tastes like it was made the same day. This is certainly a component that sets this apart from other sandwich shops. Make sure you pay attention when ordering though, as these are not subtle flavours! The restaurant itself is small and has limited seating. However, this allows for some intimacy and coziness. Just don t bring the baseball team and things will be fine, although you certainly might want to if you want them to feel rewarded!
Hands down the best sandwich place in the city!
Easily the best sandwich on the west coast. Impressed every time.

hands down the best sandwiches in town. the owner is a true artisan. always fresh and tasty ingrediants. a bit on the pricey side but after you sink your teeth into their sandwiches, youll know where your hard earned money went. ive been to #e dozens of times over the past 4 years and will continue to go. ive never had a bad experience or been disappointed in the quality of food. thankyou #e for all you do and for being one of the few shops that really take pride in what you serve to the public. i just wish theyd bring back their pizzas though!
Had nearly all of their sandwiches and each time Im impressed. Gem of a spot. Favourite is the catfish poboy.
Great sandwich! Very fresh bread. Staff were so friendly, great service. I had the veggie sandwich but will be back to try more :)

I find myself day dreaming about these sandwiches often. The bread is so good it s almost biscuit like. Never read the menu, always order the special and I ve never been disappointed! The chef/owner always goes above and beyond. Im new to the area and a friend recommended this place, it is a real challenge to not drain my bank account at number e every day. Try the salad and house drinks too!!
Best sandwich Ive ever had

I worked at a business close to this place for a few years.  The food here is amazing.  The freshly made bread, the thought that goes into the recipes; outstanding.  For the longest time, i was addicted to the sandwiches here; thursdays, most but not all, they do a special lamb sandwich.  Get there soon because it does not last.  Anyhow,  they now have pizzas during the nights and if youre in the area its a must try!

These guys are absolutely phenomenal. Clean kitchen, great personalities, and drop dead quality food. Their bread is always fresh, and the service is great. I reccommend the brownies which they make themselves, the macaroni and cheese,  and the Ruben  which is perfect.
Was a bit intimidated walking into the restaurant as it s right quarters. Got the special and was impressed with the bun/bread, kudos to the salted butter buns. Classic

This place is so good!  For some reason, it has some kind of visibility problem  I keep forgetting its there and that it exists, but every time I go, Im reminded about how awesome it is. So good! great sandwiches. they make their own bread.  quality ingredients.

Been to this place a couple of times because its right under our building and very convenient. I believe the place opened up not too long ago. I ordered the chicken sandwich, which actually took a while to make but Im not gonna complain about the time because when a sandwich takes 10 minutes to make and tastes that delicious, I could care less! They have a small menu and a variety of fresh juices in the fridge. I really enjoyed my experience at this sandwich shop and hope more people walk in and try it out.

The quality of the food is unmistakable.  My crispy chicken parmesan sandwich was finger licking good in a creative, carefully- made way that the Colonel could never have imagined.  The sauce of tomato, basil pesto and bechamel was also outstanding.  The fact that they make their own bread is another sign of their commitment to freshness and flavour.  The lamb on Thursdays is delicious. This would be a great meal to eat on the grass near Sunset Beach, if not at one of their tables. Or at home with the cat looking meaningfully at us.

Was walking by and saw a guy eating what looked like a great sandwich. Asked him about it, then went in and ordered it. Well, unfortunately I ll never enjoy another Reuben sandwich again UNLESS IT S FROM THIS PLACE.  I m a Reuben kinda nut, and I felt like I had never had one before once I started eating this. Great or best doesn t even come close. The take home meals looked great and regretted I couldn t eat more with the time I had. I ve been looking for a  legit  sandwich shop for a year or two in the city, but am only there on business a few times and week and don t always have a lot of free time. So after trying different places I ve found online, and researching YELP and a million other places... I just accidentally stumble into this one, and only cuz I saw  dude eating the sandwich outside. Very low key, have walked by a bunch and never realized what I was missing. My only regret is, after passing by this place a lot getting my haircut, etc... I realize I ve missed out on probably a dozen or so occasions that I could have been eating here. I ll make up for lost time. Do yourself a favour, and just eat a sandwich here. You ll see.
Love this joint.  Great sandwiches and one of the best pizzas in the city... no kidding.
This place is fantastic. - exactly the type of food establishment that is clearly missing in Vancouver. Clean, freshly prepared honest food. Actual customer interaction.

Saw the great reviews so checked it out and was not disappointed! The sandwiches are outrageously tasty- we had the special which was smoked meats and guacamole and the Reuben. Both were so fresh and not greasy. The coffee is good too and the guys running it are super friendly. Thanks #e!
Chicken rosemary sandwich, soup, bread, perfection.
Hands down the best sandwich shop in Vancouver. Fresh bread, new special everyday, high quality ingredients at a good price. This is a regular stop for me and Im always impressed.
Amazing place! The best food in downtown.

I never write reviews but I really must for this little place in the otherwise unexciting long block from Pacific to Drake. Number e food is a gem. Delicious  sandwiches on their daily made focaccia rolls, soups, salads and in the evening outstanding pizzas. Homemade sauces, their own pickled jalapenos, locally sourced, high quality ingredients - this place is just great. Just a few bar seats to eat in, so take it away.
Really good bread made in-house with their own starter. Fresh and delicious toppings, with rotating menu options to boot. And friendly service! My favourite is the breakfast sandwich
Ordered from #E Food for a work meeting! Would highly recommend! Ordering was easy! They were reliable and the sandwiches were delicious!!!
Hands down best sandwiches in Vancouver. Their mac and cheese is my best friends favorite. Also, they have awesome vegan options!  Im only giving 5 stars cause I cant give more.
Sandwiches with personality! The food here is fantastic, and you can always expect a unique daily special. I come here often and have never once been disappointed. The owner is a cool guy too.
You gotta try this place! The grilled cheese was unbelievable. They make all their bread. My wife and I were seriously impressed!!
Everyone in our 6 person party said the food was amazing!! I had the chicken Mac with hot sauce and it was damn good. Very nice staff too! GO HERE!
Been coming here for years. Love this place. Fresh bread, unique sandwiches, always very tasty. My favorites are lamb thursdays and crispy chicken saturdays!
Amazing food and warm, personable service. I cant believe I had been passing by this place all these years and never tried their soups and sandwiches. Have some catching up to do now!

I originally stopped in to number e after reading only but three words, pemperton meatloaf sandwich. As delightful as the meatloaf was I could hardly get past just how outstanding the sourdough bun is, mind blowing even. It is remarkable. After a few re visits for my beloved meatloaf, I was walking by and my eyes caught gaze of the daily feature.. Lamb!!! Super tasty, very tender. After demoing the rest of the line up I have been quite stuck on the reuben. Stop walking past and thinking about having it for lunch sometime next week and go in for a bite!! The grab and go is also very tasty.
Absolute best sandwiches of my life, and that s plural. The more sandwiches I try the more amazed I get. I highly recommend lamb Thursday!
Definitely a top sandwich place! Everything is freshly made in house and the owner and the guys working with him are some of the nicest around. HIGHLY recommend.
In my list of top 5 sandwiches in Vancouver. So fresh. They make their own bread and its one of the best parts of their sandwiches.
What a find. Terrific sandwiches. Fresh ingredients. In house prepared. All breads and pastries made in house.

not that this place needs more 5 star reviews but just felt like thanking the owners and staff for the great food and service. Didnt think I would like anything more than an Angus reuben but I was wrong, Po Boy sandwich was just as good. Love that this place exists
Hats down, best sandwich shop in Vancouver!
Absolutely Best soups and sandwiches in the city. Fresh ingredients full of flavour, the entire menu is worth checking out. Best staff as well <3 fan 4 life
I just had an amazing mac n cheese, fried chicken sandwich.  Such good value and it tasted great! Friendly service.  Really good spot. Give it a try!
Best sandwiches and bread in downtown! Been having their chicken sandwich for years. Fresh bread made every morning.
Owner is very friendly and likes to converse with the patrons. Fresh bread and fresh food. Very quaint and personable little shop.

Delicious! Walked by this place for years and never really paid attention. Decided to give it a shot last week and have been back twice already. Sad I missed out on those sandwiches for all those years. Now to make up for lost time.
Consistently good high quality food that tastes great. My wife and I always get the chicken sandwich! Can t find a better bun than this place.
Absolutely gorgeous sandwiches with creative recipes and kind service. Ive never had the same sandwich twice and they are all exquisite.
Amazing Sandwich and Lunch spot!! Owner is the nicest man in the business. Highly recommend checking this place out and most certainly will be back!
Execellent food, better service. Daily specials to change it up from their standard menu and the people really care about customer service. Give the sandwiches a try - their bread is amazing!
Best meatloaf sandwich in Vancouver. Size is not depordising quality and taste. Delicious bun, I usually skip it. Service is very good.
Excellent food and an amazing chef. Great one stop shop for sandwiche lovers! Always something new to try and appreciate.
This place is wonderful! The bread is delicious. They have great brownies. Everyone Ive talked to is really friendly too.
Awesome food, super nice people. We stayed near here while visiting and made a point of visiting again before we left. We tried 6 separate sandwiches and pastas. All were yummy, fresh and filling.
Just found this place and love it. Sandwiches are amazing, fresh bread and quality ingredients. The staff are cool too.
